definition: to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

sentences.english: The coding procedure can be repeated up to 4 times for additional remotes.
sentences.chinese: 這個程序可以進行4次，也就是說可以配4個遙控器。

sentences.english: You can control the number and size of the balls by clicking the keys on the remote control.
sentences.chinese: 您可以通過單擊遙控器上的鍵控制球的數量和大小。

sentences.english: It seems that the people who have solved this problem did so by buying expensive universal remotes.
sentences.chinese: 似乎解決問題的人都這樣購買昂貴的通用遙控器。

sentences.english: Crane is a wireless remote control devices to operate cranes.
sentences.chinese: 天車無線遙控器是一種能夠操作起重機的設備。

sentences.english: A new telecontrol of digital family spare location Television is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一款新型的數字家庭空間定位電視遙控器。

sentences.english: The recorder can be controlled through a touch-sensitive front panel or via a mouse, remote control, or keyboard.
sentences.chinese: 錄像機可以通過觸摸面板，鼠標，遙控器或鍵盤操控。

sentences.english: The remote control is the precise manufacture, please not again falls or immerses .
sentences.chinese: 遙控器是精密製造，請勿重摔或浸水。

sentences.english: Watch out for the refrigerator door handle. The TV remote, too.
sentences.chinese: 注意你的冰箱門把手和電視遙控器。

sentences.english: My fireboat will be equipped with a remote TV camera in the Wheelhouse.
sentences.chinese: 我的滅火輪將配備一個遙控器在電視鏡頭舵手。

sentences.english: Lastly, the remote should connect with Bluetooth, not IR.
sentences.chinese: 最後，這個遙控器應該用藍牙連接，而非紅外。

sentences.english: So, don't toss out your garage door openers or cordless phones, people.
sentences.chinese: 所以，朋友，別扔掉你的車庫門遙控器或無繩電話。

sentences.english: It might spell the end of fiddling around for remote controls in between the sofa cushions.
sentences.chinese: 亂翻沙發墊找遙控器的時代就要終結了。

sentences.english: Whenever I cannot find the clicker, I look behind the couch.
sentences.chinese: 當我找不到遙控器的時候我就看沙發的後面。

sentences.english: Sorry, the remote is in Chinese, I hope this explanation can help you.
sentences.chinese: 不好意思，遙控器是中文的，希望這張說明能幫到你。

sentences.english: My television remote wouldn't work and I forgot a tooth-brush.
sentences.chinese: 我的電視遙控器不好用了，我還忘了帶牙刷了。

sentences.english: Mainly in the production of remote control, ignition coil , potentiometer-based private enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 主要以生產遙控器，高壓包，電位器爲主的民營企業。

definition: button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
power switch/gas valve/to open the city (or frontier) gate/to open and close/to switch on and off
tablet computer (iPad, Android devices etc)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
easily/without trouble/while one is at it/in passing/handy
